greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of (99+14*sqrt(2))/97.
comment: lim_{n -> infinity} b(n)/b(n-1) = (99+14*sqrt(2))/97 for n mod 3 = {1, 2}, b = A129836.
lim_{n -> infinity} b(n)/b(n-1) = (99+14*sqrt(2))/97 for n mod 3 = {0, 2}, b = A157469.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
xref: Cf. A129836, A157469, A002193 (decimal expansion of sqrt(2)), A157471 (decimal expansion of (19491+12070*sqrt(2))/97^2).
results.author: _Klaus Brockhaus_, Mar 12 2009
